document.full_text: jim brady, ronald reagan's former press secretary, on wednesday marked the 30th anniversary of the presidential assassination attempt that left him in a wheelchair by urging congressmen to toughen gun control.
document.title: after 30 years, jim brady continues to push for gun control
lines_and_colors: jim brady, ronald reagan's former press secretary, on wednesday marked the 30th anniversary of the presidential assassination attempt that left him in a wheelchair by urging congressmen to toughen gun control.
